subject: Re: Mike's Box 12.470 Proto 1
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
OK, I am working with a 12-469, as the old 470 models are all gone in 
my area.  I purchased an amplifed speaker(s) to add to the earbud 
jack and an amplified mic to add to my audio recorder.  As mentioned 
before, my plans are to build an echo chamber for the 12-469, piping 
the audio through the speaker(s) into one end of the box, and 
capturing on the mic at the far end.  I am also putting sound holes 
(like a grill) on the far end, so the sound can come out and be heard 
by all.  The proect boxes come in various sizes and are cheap at 
Radio Shack.  They should prove perfect for an echo chamber. 

How am I doing, Mike?
